channel.title: Join the Official Throne of Lies Discord Server - Now Open!
channel.description:
We just created the Throne of Lies Discord today!
**Step 1: Get the Discord app - https://discordapp.com**
**Step 2: Join the Throne of Lies server - https://discord.gg/tol**
All of us from the Throne of Lies team will be here for live chat with all of you. There's a channel ready for feedback/suggestions there, too.
Don't be shy, and say hey! We'll share things with you first, and it's possible we'll reward a small handful of the most active and helpful of you with access to our game for free down the road.
See ya there! :wink:

item.description:
We just created the Throne of Lies Discord today!

Step 1: Get the Discord app - https://discordapp.com

Step 2: Join the Throne of Lies server - https://discord.gg/tol

All of us from the Throne of Lies team will be here for live chat with all of you. There’s a channel ready for feedback/suggestions there, too.

Don’t be shy, and say hey! We’ll share things with you first, and it’s possible we’ll reward a small handful of the most active and helpful of you with access to our game for free down the road.

See ya there!
